meta.title: Menorca Rugby Club - Live the Rugby Passion
meta.description: Discover Menorca Rugby Club. Join our community and experience rugby passion in Menorca with values of respect, teamwork and discipline.

hero.subtitle: Live rugby passion in the heart of the Mediterranean

about.title: Our Club
about.subtitle: More than a sport, a family

history.description: Menorca Rugby Club was born over 20 years ago from passion for this noble sport and love for our island. Founded by a group of English enthusiasts, the club grew with the mission to transmit the essential values of rugby: respect, integrity, passion, solidarity and discipline. Today we continue sharing that same spirit, bringing rugby closer to our community and building a great family on and off the field.

about.philosophy_text: We believe in rugby as a comprehensive training tool. We develop not only sports skills, but also values that transcend the playing field and enrich the lives of our players.

team.title: Our Teams
team.subtitle: Players of all ages and levels

senior.title: Senior Team
senior.subtitle: The heart of the club
senior.description: Our senior team competes in the Balearic League, facing rivals from Mallorca and Ibiza in a round-robin championship. At the end of the season, the top four compete for the title. We also have a women's team that participates in Rugby 7's, taking the spirit of rugby to the highest level.

youth.title: Youth Team
youth.subtitle: The future of rugby
youth.description: Aimed at players aged 14 to 18, our youth team participates in the Balearic League, measuring strength against teams from Mallorca and Ibiza. Additionally, they have presence in national selections and various tournaments, both official and friendly, providing them with a unique experience of sporting and personal growth.

school.title: Rugby School
school.subtitle: First steps
school.description: The foundation of our club begins with the youngest: from 6 to 12 years old. Although they don't compete in leagues, they enjoy the fun "Rugby Days", events where SUB6, SUB8, SUB10 and SUB12 teams play short matches, have fun and learn that what matters is not the result, but enjoying the game. Each team plays between 3 and 4 matches per day, always with smiles.

store.title: Official Store
store.subtitle: Take Menorca Rugby colors with you

jersey.description: Official Menorca Rugby Club jersey for 2025 season. Exclusive design with traditional colors.

cap.description: Adjustable cap with embroidered club official shield. Premium quality material.

pack.title: Complete Pack
pack.description: Complete pack: jersey + shorts + socks. Ideal for new players.

featured.title: Registrations Open!
featured.description: Join Menorca Rugby Club. Registrations open for all categories: School, Youth and Senior.

join.title: Join the Family
join.description: Are you passionate about rugby? Want to be part of a unique community in Menorca? Menorca Rugby Club is waiting for you.

categories.members: Support the club as member or volunteer

footer.description: Experience rugby passion in Menorca. More than a sport, a family united by rugby values.

chat.external_info: You will be redirected to our real-time chat where you can speak directly with our team.
